database.name: VIEW REPORT_PROJECTPROPOSAL
database.view: SELECT P.DATESEND AS FROMDATESEND, P.DATESEND AS TODATESEND, P.AD_CLIENT_ID, P.AD_ORG_ID, P.AD_USER_ID, P.C_BPARTNER_ID, P.C_BPARTNER_LOCATION_ID, P.C_PROJECT_ID, P.C_PROJECTPROPOSAL_ID, P.ISSOTRX, U.FIRSTNAME, U.LASTNAME, P.DATESEND, P.CREATED, P.CREATEDBY, P.UPDATED, P.UPDATEDBY FROM C_PROJECTPROPOSAL P, AD_USER U WHERE P.AD_USER_ID = U.AD_USER_ID AND P.ISACTIVE = 'Y'
